name: brands_fetch_and_process_workflow:ENTITY_MODEL_VAR:ENTITY_VERSION_VAR:CHAT_ID_VAR
description: Workflow to fetch brand data from an external API, process each brand entity, and finalize the job entity

transitions.name: fetch_brands
transitions.description: Fetch brand data from the external API

transitions.name: process_brands
transitions.description: Process each fetched brand entity using process_brand
transitions.end_state_description: All brand entities have been processed

externalized_processors.name: process_brand
externalized_processors.description: Processes a single brand entity by adding a processed timestamp and handling potential errors

transitions.name: finalize_job
transitions.description: Finalize the job entity by updating status and processed count
